metadata.synopsis: Maggran (druid guarding the entrance to the inner sanctum of the Emerald Grove) is in bear form. He delivers curt, bestial one-liners if the player has speak with animals. He doesn't want them around. He has a lone human fallback line should he somehow transform.

0.speaker: Maggran
0.context: NodeContext: SFX only - animal sound. Do not record.

1.speaker: Maggran
1.text: The rite has been stopped - for now. But I'm still watching you.
1.context: NodeContext: In human form. A terse warning

2.speaker: Maggran
2.text: You're lucky I'm not in my bear form. Back off.
2.context: NodeContext: Human form. He's done talking and wants rid of the player

3.speaker: Maggran
3.text: Do not squander our generosity - respect the grove.
3.context: NodeContext: In human form. A terse warning
